Posts.Content: Jan 3, 2009 01:47AM bfb0123 wrote: This is my first posting.  I received my diagnosis on Nov. 18.  Everything happened so quick!  I had my yearly mammo Nov 6, got a call to come back for additional film on Nov 11 and had an ultrasound the same day.  Immediately after, a biopsy was scheduled for the 14th.  I had a lumpectomy on Dec 4, less than a month from the original mammogram.  My lymph nodes were clear, but pre-cancerous cells were found in the surrounding tissue, and I had a second lumpectomy on Dec 30th, and also had a mediport placed for chemo.  I meet with my oncologist on Jan 12th to discuss the chemo treatment, so I do not know a lot about it now, but she originally said chemo for 6 months (Does this sound right???) followed by radiation.  I guess I will know more in a week and a half... Barbara
Posts.Title: Starting chemo January 2009? lisalisa ktym
